info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 145 PM MST... At 101 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McDowell Mountain Park, or 7 miles northeast of Scottsdale, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could produce localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Rio Verde, McDowell Mountain Park and Fort McDowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
